tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE building_permits ( permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
permit_number VARCHAR(255),
issue_date DATE,
expiry_date DATE,
project_description TEXT,
location VARCHAR(255),
architect VARCHAR(255),
contractor VARCHAR(255),
permit_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE building_permits (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_number INT NOT NULL,
    permit_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE,
    permit_holder VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE building_locations (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_id UUID REFERENCES building_permits (id),
    address VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    zip_code VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE historical_permits (
  permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_name VARCHAR(255),
  permit_date DATE,
  permit_type VARCHAR(50),
  permit_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE building_details (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_address VARCHAR(255),
  building_type VARCHAR(50),
  construction_date DATE,
  architect_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE building_permits (
    permit_id INT,
    building_name VARCHAR(255),
    permit_date DATE,
    permit_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE permit_applicants (
    applicant_id INT,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
    applicant_contact VARCHAR(100),
    permit_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE permit_locations (
    location_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_address VARCHAR(255),
    permit_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE permit_history (
    history_id INT,
    permit_id INT,
    action_date DATE,
    action_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE building_permits (
  permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  permit_date DATE,
  building_name VARCHAR(255),
  construction_type VARCHAR(50),
  permit_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE permit_applicants (
  applicant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
  applicant_contact VARCHAR(50),
  applicant_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE construction_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(100),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  material_supplier VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE construction_workers (
  worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  worker_name VARCHAR(255),
  worker_position VARCHAR(50),
  worker_contact VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE permit_comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  permit_id INT,
  comment_text TEXT,
  comment_date DATE,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255)
)
